getCommission() - Method in class ePortfolio.Stock
 
getGain() - Method in class ePortfolio.Investment
Calculates and returns the gain (or loss) for the investment, which is the difference between the current value and the book value.
getGain() - Method in class ePortfolio.MutualFund
Calculates and returns the gain (or loss) for the mutual fund, which is the difference between the current value and the book value, minus the redemption fee.
getGain() - Method in class ePortfolio.Stock
Calculates and returns the gain (or loss) for the stock, which is the difference between the current value and the book value, minus the commission fee.

Returns the name of the investment.
